author: rhuijben
msg: Switch some argument ordering in the entries tweaking to follow
the precedent of db, local_abspath, kind, parent_stub.

author: rhuijben
msg: Remove the XFail marking from the copy then replace merge tests, because
WC-NG now recognizes that the addition of M below J is not a separate
addition, but just an addition via copying its parent with history.

author: rhuijben
msg: In the entries update code: Make the fold_scheduling() function a bit
less hairy, by moving the entries cache/hash updating code out of the
(fold_scheduling): Take entry and parent entry and a few extra output
values instead of the entries hash.
svn_wc__entry_modify): Update the entries hash, instead of making
fold_scheduling change the hash in some specific cases.

author: rhuijben
msg: Add XFail test on how we handle 'svn cp' on directories containing

author: gstein
msg: When doing a post-update bump, we only need to deal with the BASE tree. An
update only touches BASE, so we can iterate over just the BASE children.
(tweak_entries): iterate over the BASE children, rather than "all
